info.title: Swagger Petstore
info.description: A sample API that uses a petstore as an example to demonstrate features in the swagger-2.0 specification

get.description:
Returns all pets from the system that the user has access to

post.description: Creates a new pet in the store.  Duplicates are allowed

parameters.name: pet
parameters.description: Pet to add to the store

get.description: Returns a user based on a single ID, if the user does not have access to the pet

delete.description: deletes a single pet based on the ID supplied
